comments.comment: Unfortunately not for me. I don't do a thing :3 i stay at home, i go to no events. Im 10 now next thing i know it, im 16, im 18, im moving out my parents house, im starting my own family, time passes and i dont even know it. I look in the mirror,  im 87 years old. Im glad i survived this far, but i realize that i have little time left. With my lack of abilities i cant do much. I missed my opportunities to do stuff. Get out, go places. Now i pass away, peacefully by old age and my generation passes on. When you said that it kinda triggered me because life IS short.  Edit: September 26, 2019 7:11pm I'm getting much criticism on what my previous comment said so I what to make some adjustments.   Unfortunately, not for me. I don't get to do many things because I don't have much money, so I only stay at home for the majority of the time. I don't go to any events mainly for money purposes. I'm 10, now 11 next thing i know it, im 16, im 18, im moving out my parents house, im starting my own family, time passes and i dont even know it. I look in the mirror,  im 87 years old. Im glad i survived this far, but i realize that i have little time left. With my lack of abilities i cant do much. I missed my opportunities to do stuff. Get out, go places. Now i pass away, peacefully by old age and my generation passes on. When you said that I disagreed because in my opinion, life is kinda short for me.
